text: Boucle du Mouhoun is a region in Burkina Faso. The capital city is Dédougou. It was created on 2 July 2001. Six provinces make up the Boucle du Mouhoun region — Balé, Banwa, Kossi, Mouhoun, Nayala, and Sourou. There are three major rivers, the Red Volta, Black Volta and White Volta. Category:Regions of Burkina Faso Category:2001 establishments in Africa
title: Boucle du Mouhoun Region
